bool priority (int priority)

Detailed Description

Basic event from which all events derive.

All events derive from this class, so it's useful for use in containers

Member Function Documentation

Event's file descriptor.

Event's file descriptor.
bool UEvent_Base::pending ( short  ev = EV_READ,
UTimeVal *  tv = 0 
) [inline]

Checks if there is an event pending.

Parameters:
ev type of event to check. There are 4 kind of events: EV_TIMEOUT, EV_READ, EV_WRITE or EV_SIGNAL. EV_PERSIST is not an event, is an event modifier flag, that tells libevent that this event should live until del() is called.
Returns:
true if there is a pending event, false if not.
bool UEvent_Base::priority ( int  priority  )  [inline]

Sets the event's priority.

Parameters:
priority New event priority.
Precondition:
The event must be added to UDispatcher.
See also:
UDispatcher::priority_init()
